reviews.review_msg: Lecture's are extremely boring and takes up the entire 3 hour lecture time. Half way through the semester and we have not been graded or assigned anything, so hard to keep up with what's going on in class.

Rambles alot but is SO sweet. No need to read from textbook, very important to listen to him and his slides; so attendance matters. He gives great feedback and help if you need on essays, etc. Hard to listen to him talk but helps to have a friend in class to go through it together. Read textbook for extra understanding.

Nesbit is such a kind professor and really cares about his students. He gives good feedback and what we learned throughout the course were very interesting and I would definitely take courses with him again.
